subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Bill O’Brien, formerly of the Patriots, began the task of reshaping a Penn State program that is still reeling from a scandal and the death of Joe Paterno.
snippet: Bill O’Brien, formerly of the Patriots, began the task of reshaping a Penn State program that is still reeling from a scandal and the death of Joe Paterno.
